<style>
/* Prevent page scroll - only chat scrolls */
html, body {
  overflow: hidden !important;
  height: 100vh !important;
}

/* Hide page title */
#title-block-header {
  display: none !important;
}

/* Full width overrides for Quarto */
#quarto-content {
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}

#quarto-content.page-columns {
  display: block !important;
}

main.content,
#quarto-document-content {
  max-width: 100% !important;
  width: 100% !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}

.slides-chat-container {
  position: fixed;
  top: 60px; /* navbar height */
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  background: #fff;
  border-radius: 0;
  box-shadow: none;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.slides-chat-header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #5a67d8 0%, #9f7aea 100%);
  color: white;
  padding: 16px 20px;
}

.slides-chat-header h3 {
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
}

.slides-chat-messages {
  flex: 1;
  overflow-y: auto;
  padding: 20px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
  background: #f8f9fa;
}

.slides-chat-welcome {
  text-align: center;
  color: #666;
  padding: 30px 20px;
  line-height: 1.6;
}

.slides-chat-message {
  max-width: 85%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border-radius: 16px;
  line-height: 1.5;
}

.slides-chat-message.user {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #5a67d8 0%, #9f7aea 100%);
  color: white;
  margin-left: auto;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 4px;
}

.slides-chat-message.assistant {
  background: white;
  color: #333;
  margin-right: auto;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
}

.slides-chat-message.error {
  background: #fee2e2;
  color: #dc2626;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.slides-typing-indicator {
  display: flex;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: 16px;
  width: fit-content;
}

.slides-typing-indicator span {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
  background: #9f7aea;
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: typing 1.4s infinite ease-in-out;
}

.slides-typing-indicator span:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
.slides-typing-indicator span:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }

@keyframes typing {
  0%, 60%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
  30% { transform: translateY(-8px); }
}

.slides-chat-input-area {
  display: flex;
  gap: 10px;
  padding: 16px;
  background: white;
  border-top: 1px solid #eee;
}

#slides-chat-input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 2px solid #e2e8f0;
  border-radius: 25px;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

#slides-chat-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: #9f7aea;
}

.slides-chat-send {
  width: 48px;
  height: 48px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: none;
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #5a67d8 0%, #9f7aea 100%);
  color: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.slides-chat-send:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

/* Token Info Display */
.slides-token-info {
  background: #f8f9fa;
  border-top: 1px solid #eee;
  padding: 8px 16px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
}

.slides-token-bar-container {
  flex: 1;
  height: 6px;
  background: #e2e8f0;
  border-radius: 3px;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.slides-token-bar {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  background: #28a745;
  border-radius: 3px;
  transition: width 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.slides-token-text {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: #666;
  white-space: nowrap;
  min-width: 130px;
  text-align: right;
}
</style>

<div class="slides-chat-container">
  <div class="slides-chat-header">
    <h3>Assistant IA - Questions sur les Slides</h3>
  </div>

  <div class="slides-chat-messages" id="slides-chat-messages">
    <div class="slides-chat-welcome">
      Pose tes questions sur le contenu des cours.<br>
      Exemple : "Explique-moi la slide 15" ou "C'est quoi la probabilite conditionnelle ?"
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="slides-chat-input-area">
    <input type="text" id="slides-chat-input" placeholder="Pose ta question..." autocomplete="off">
    <button class="slides-chat-send" id="slides-chat-send">
      <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="20" height="20" fill="currentColor">
        <path d="M2.01 21L23 12 2.01 3 2 10l15 2-15 2z"/>
      </svg>
    </button>
  </div>
  <div class="slides-token-info">
    <div class="slides-token-bar-container">
      <div class="slides-token-bar" id="slides-token-bar"></div>
    </div>
    <span class="slides-token-text" id="slides-token-text">Tokens: -- / --</span>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Load MathJax -->
<script>
window.MathJax = {
  tex: {
    inlineMath: [['\\(', '\\)']],
    displayMath: [['\\[', '\\]']],
    processEscapes: true
  },
  options: {
    skipHtmlTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre']
  }
};
</script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mathjax@3/es5/tex-mml-chtml.js" async></script>

<script>
(function() {
  var conversationHistory = [];

  // Token quota tracking - shared with chat.js via localStorage
  var TOKEN_STORAGE_KEY = 'aiChatTokenInfo';
  var TOKEN_QUOTA_WINDOW_MS = 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000; // 24 hours

  function loadTokenInfo() {
    try {
      var stored = localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_STORAGE_KEY);
      if (stored) {
        var data = JSON.parse(stored);
        // Check if quota should be reset (24h passed)
        if (data.resetTime && Date.now() > data.resetTime) {
          return { used: 0, remaining: 50000, max: 50000, resetTime: Date.now() + TOKEN_QUOTA_WINDOW_MS };
        }
        return data;
      }
    } catch (e) {
      console.warn('Failed to load token info from localStorage:', e);
    }
    return { used: 0, remaining: 50000, max: 50000, resetTime: Date.now() + TOKEN_QUOTA_WINDOW_MS };
  }

  function saveTokenInfo() {
    try {
      localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(tokenInfo));
    } catch (e) {
      console.warn('Failed to save token info to localStorage:', e);
    }
  }

  var tokenInfo = loadTokenInfo();

  function updateTokenDisplay(tokens) {
    if (tokens) {
      tokenInfo = {
        used: tokens.used !== undefined ? tokens.used : tokenInfo.used,
        remaining: tokens.remaining !== undefined ? tokens.remaining : tokenInfo.remaining,
        max: tokens.max || tokenInfo.max,
        lastRequest: tokens.total || 0,
        resetTime: tokenInfo.resetTime || (Date.now() + TOKEN_QUOTA_WINDOW_MS)
      };
      saveTokenInfo();
    }

    var tokenBar = document.getElementById('slides-token-bar');
    var tokenText = document.getElementById('slides-token-text');

    if (tokenBar && tokenText) {
      var percentage = Math.max(0, Math.min(100, (tokenInfo.remaining / tokenInfo.max) * 100));
      tokenBar.style.width = percentage + '%';

      if (percentage > 50) {
        tokenBar.style.backgroundColor = '#28a745';
      } else if (percentage > 20) {
        tokenBar.style.backgroundColor = '#ffc107';
      } else {
        tokenBar.style.backgroundColor = '#dc3545';
      }

      var formatNum = function(n) { return n.toLocaleString('fr-FR'); };
      tokenText.textContent = 'Tokens: ' + formatNum(tokenInfo.remaining) + ' / ' + formatNum(tokenInfo.max);

      if (tokenInfo.lastRequest > 0) {
        tokenText.title = 'Dernière requête: ' + tokenInfo.lastRequest + ' tokens';
      }
    }
  }

  function parseMarkdown(text) {
    text = text.replace(/\*\*([^*]+)\*\*/g, '<strong>$1</strong>');
    text = text.replace(/\n\n/g, '</p><p>');
    return '<p>' + text + '</p>';
  }

  function sendMessage(message) {
    if (!message || !message.trim()) return;

    var messagesDiv = document.getElementById('slides-chat-messages');
    var input = document.getElementById('slides-chat-input');

    var welcome = messagesDiv.querySelector('.slides-chat-welcome');
    if (welcome) welcome.remove();

    var userMsg = document.createElement('div');
    userMsg.className = 'slides-chat-message user';
    userMsg.textContent = message;
    messagesDiv.appendChild(userMsg);
    input.value = '';

    var typing = document.createElement('div');
    typing.className = 'slides-typing-indicator';
    typing.innerHTML = '<span></span><span></span><span></span>';
    messagesDiv.appendChild(typing);
    messagesDiv.scrollTop = messagesDiv.scrollHeight;

    fetch('/.netlify/functions/chat', {
      method: 'POST',
      headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
      body: JSON.stringify({
        message: message,
        conversationHistory: conversationHistory,
        context: {
          intent: 'OPEN_CHAT',
          styleMode: 'classique',
          source: 'global'
        }
      })
    })
    .then(function(response) { return response.json(); })
    .then(function(data) {
      typing.remove();

      // Update token display
      if (data.tokens) {
        updateTokenDisplay(data.tokens);
      }

      if (data.error) {
        var errMsg = document.createElement('div');
        errMsg.className = 'slides-chat-message error';
        errMsg.textContent = data.error;
        messagesDiv.appendChild(errMsg);
        // Update tokens from error response (quota exceeded)
        if (data.tokensUsed !== undefined) {
          updateTokenDisplay({
            used: data.tokensUsed,
            remaining: data.tokensRemaining,
            max: data.tokensMax
          });
        }
      } else {
        conversationHistory.push({ role: 'user', content: message });
        conversationHistory.push({ role: 'assistant', content: data.response });

        if (conversationHistory.length > 20) {
          conversationHistory = conversationHistory.slice(-20);
        }

        var assistantMsg = document.createElement('div');
        assistantMsg.className = 'slides-chat-message assistant';
        assistantMsg.innerHTML = parseMarkdown(data.response);
        messagesDiv.appendChild(assistantMsg);

        // Render MathJax after content is added
        if (window.MathJax && window.MathJax.typesetPromise) {
          MathJax.typesetPromise([assistantMsg]).catch(function(err) {
            console.log('MathJax error:', err);
          });
        } else {
          // MathJax not ready yet, wait and retry
          setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.MathJax && window.MathJax.typesetPromise) {
              MathJax.typesetPromise([assistantMsg]);
            }
          }, 500);
        }
      }
      messagesDiv.scrollTop = messagesDiv.scrollHeight;
    })
    .catch(function(error) {
      typing.remove();
      var errMsg = document.createElement('div');
      errMsg.className = 'slides-chat-message error';
      errMsg.textContent = 'Erreur de connexion. Reessayez.';
      messagesDiv.appendChild(errMsg);
      messagesDiv.scrollTop = messagesDiv.scrollHeight;
    });
  }

  document.getElementById('slides-chat-send').addEventListener('click', function() {
    sendMessage(document.getElementById('slides-chat-input').value);
  });

  document.getElementById('slides-chat-input').addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
    if (e.key === 'Enter') {
      sendMessage(this.value);
    }
  });

  // Initialize token display
  updateTokenDisplay();
})();
</script>
